summary: This bill, the Ralph David Abernathy, Sr. National Historic Site Act, proposes to establish a national historic site in Georgia to preserve and interpret the historic West Hunter Street Baptist Church and the role of Reverend Dr. Abernathy in the civil rights movement. The bill outlines definitions, establishes the site contingent upon land acquisition, defines the boundary, allows for land acquisition, and mandates a management plan. It also allows for cooperative agreements to provide interpretive and educational services related to the site.
